//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "steam_fx0r", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	loop ( -1 )
	{
		use ( "steam_1a" );
		use ( "steam_1b" );
		wait ( 500.000 );
		use ( "steam_3a" );
		use ( "steam_3b" );
		wait ( 3000.000 );
		use ( "steam_2a" );
		use ( "steam_2b" );
		wait ( 1500.000 );
		use ( "steam_3a" );
		use ( "steam_3b" );
		wait ( 500.000 );
	}

}
